question_text: Which of the following are common methods for migrating a laptopâ€™s storage drive? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Creating a full system backup and restoring it
Manually replacing the drive without transferring data
Using cloning software provided by the SSD manufacturer
correct_answer: Creating a full system backup and restoring it
Using cloning software provided by the SSD manufacturer
explanation: Drive migration can be performed using imaging, backup/restore methods, or cloning utilities.
